EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Elaine, Per the introduction from John I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here. <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK> You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: John Berry [mailto:berry@hireme2.com] Sent: Tuesday, August 28, 2012 9:31 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Cc: Elaine Bruckman Subject: MBO Partners and Elaine Bruckman Nicolette: Elaine Bruckman wants to consider using MBO’s services.She’s presently at M&T Bank like at least on other person is that you are presently working with.I’m giving her your contact information via this email and she might be contacting you in the near future. Elaine: Below is contact information for Nicolette at MBO partners.___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Corporate statement: -That the activities that I engage in my work with other people, inspires them and enriches their lives. -That I am an opening thru which energy flows from the Source of all life, for the benefit of all. John BerryJohn Berry Personnel Consultants 800-HIRE-ME2berry@hireme2.com <mailto:berry@hireme2.com> See our job posting site at www.abesap.com/pages/nonsap.cfm <http://www.abesap.com/pages/nonsap.cfm> <http://www.linkedin.com/in/hireme2>
